name: check_timestamp
description: When the quota check was performed

name: total_tables_monitored
description: Total number of tables with load jobs

name: critical_count
description: Number of tables exceeding critical threshold (95%)

name: warning_count
description: Number of tables exceeding warning threshold (80%)

name: max_usage_pct
description: Maximum quota usage percentage across all tables

name: table_usage
description: JSON map of table_id -> load job count

name: critical_tables
description: JSON array of critical table IDs

name: warning_tables
description: JSON array of warning table IDs
